attributes.action: scrap the plan for ID cards in the light of the Child Benefit Information fiasco.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given this government's appallingly careless attitude to the security of personal information, as evidenced by the loss of the details of all 25 million child benefit recipients including name, address, date of birth, and bank account number, I no longer have any confidence in this government's ability to reliably secure and protect the personal information that would be required of me under the planned ID card scheme. 

This would include my name, gender, date of birth and biometric information such as fingerprints.

I do not feel I can trust this government not to lose, misuse or inappropriately distribute this information when it is capable of losing the personal details of 25 million people in the post!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
